name: Wherever You Will Go
description: The exciting promise of Starfleet to "boldly go" is waning for crews across the galaxy as the anomaly crisis wears on, especially those who have served the longest. Help close the distance for new crews and old as they explore the final frontier.
rules:
-- Unique Federation, Terran Empire, and Klingon Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Hoshi Sato, Reed, Tucker, or Enterprise crew will provide a bonus to Event Faction Missions.
-- Every Event Faction Mission you succeed at earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Victory Points to unlock Event Threshold Rewards.
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Hoshi Sato, Reed, Tucker, or Enterprise crew
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Wesley
featured_crew.flavor: Having met Kore, Wesley offers her a choice - to stay where she is or become a Traveler like him.

action.name: So The Universe Is Essentially A Grand Tapestry

featured_crew.name: Trip
featured_crew.flavor: Tucker's shuttle tests end in disaster - he is attacked by a hostile alien, forcing him to land on a desert planet.

action.name: What The Hell Are You Doing? Are You Crazy?

featured_crew.name: Reed
featured_crew.flavor: Looking for some company on the pleasure planet of Risa, Malcolm Reed ends up in a desperate situation.

action.name: Follow Two Aliens into a Basement

rewards.name: Federation Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Federation faction missions.

rewards.name: Klingon Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Klingon Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Terran Empire Transmission
rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Sato
rewards.flavor: Comm Officer onboard the Enterprise, Hoshi Sato's experiences led her to create a universal linguacode.

action.name: Translate

rewards.flavor: Spent to acquire Terran Empire faction missions.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tokens
rewards.flavor: Requisition Shuttle Tokens grant access to an additional Shuttle to use for a single Faction Mission.

rewards.name: Reward Multiplier
rewards.flavor: (Shuttle Missions Only) 2x rewards.

rewards.name: Credits
rewards.flavor: Credits are the galaxy's standard currency. Use Credits in the Time Portal to enlist crew members, build items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.flavor: Having met Kore, Wesley offers her a choice - to stay where she is or become a Traveler like him.

action.name: So The Universe Is Essentially A Grand Tapestry

rewards.name: Reed
rewards.flavor: Looking for some company on the pleasure planet of Risa, Malcolm Reed ends up in a desperate situation.

action.name: Follow Two Aliens into a Basement

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Wesley
rewards.flavor: Having met Kore, Wesley offers her a choice - to stay where she is or become a Traveler like him.

action.name: So The Universe Is Essentially A Grand Tapestry

rewards.name: Reed
rewards.flavor: Looking for some company on the pleasure planet of Risa, Malcolm Reed ends up in a desperate situation.

screens.text: "Thank you for answering my hail, Captain. I do realize I look relaxed for what I'm about to share, but I'm rather concerned for my crewmates. I'm aware everyone is stretched a bit thin at the moment, but our crew in particular is struggling. Exploration is losing its luster."

"Speak for yourself, Malcolm! Stranded on a deserted planet with some butthead who won't work together? I'm havin' the time of my life! Least it's a break from traveling all over creation like Archer's had us doin', tryin' to keep up with all these new settlements poppin' up."

"A-at least you can joke around. I signed on as a linguist, not some holonovel action hero! They said they wanted me to investigate new dialects, now I'm on some rescue mission? Have you seen what these Gorn do to people? So much for exploration - I'm ready to go home!"
"Terribly sorry, Hoshi, I believe something's wrong with the connection! (Captain. Please, give us a hand!)"
